String.string: I have faith in your abilities
"What kind of mission are we talking about?"
You look at Jesper in the eyes.
Find the {@linkcreature:220#1501$$teleportal} in the Halls of Utterdark in the Tenebrous Mines.
The Black Hood! He's the head of the organization. He must be killed!
Use the {@linkcreature:220#1501$$teleportal} to reach the hidden tunnel. Then find the Black Hood.
Attack the Black Hood, then speak to Elleon.
Report to Bruke in Chebika. [Press to open your inventory and use the Chebika Teleport Scroll.]
Report your conversation with Samael to Elleon.
Find and kill Scions of Lok.
